tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I have been frequently visiting Dr. Rinal’s clinic for around 1 and a half year now for all the dental related issues.
The first appointment started with tooth cavity fix by Dr. Rinal which was followed by the braces journey for spacing and alignment issues.
*** **** ** *** **** ************ ** *** *****
Both the doctor’s were really supportive and helpful throughout the journey. I am super happy with the results. I would highly recommend this clinic.
I just want to mention one thing here, Trust them :)
They got your back.
They are the best in town.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: General  Dentistry,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Indirect Sinus Lift & Implant ,Zirconia Crowns,Scaling / Polishing,
review:
Recently I had visited Dr. Rinal Modi Dental clinic and had a very nice experience when it comes to Dental care. There were many complication and I was definitely very worried about the dental issues. I found Doctor Rinal very calm, composed and she will always try to accommodate me in terms of my specific issues regarding dental. She made me so comfortable and best part is every time I visited she would remember my specific issues with out mentioning as well. My comfort was her priority, every time I went and she has instructed that to her staff as well. She used different methods to keep me at ease and always had hygiene and safety too priority. Her clinic is neat and clean with all modern infrastructure. Disposable items were used wherever possible and every time, there was no compromise in any of the hygiene issues. She has a very good team of doctors and staff.
The best thing I liked about her is that she makes her patients comfortable to the treatment first and then gradually goes about her activity regarding any issues for Dental Care. Wonderful experience and best doctor to work with for sure

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Zirconia Crowns,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,Porcelain inlays and onlays,
review:
When I made the appointment immediately they responded the following week and I was pleased it was on time
On arrival was greeted by the Dental assistant who speaks more Hindi then English and was offered water to cool off an sit down This unit is part of the hospital with shared resources between other areas. The minute I walked in the surgery i was impressed with the ambience and the quality of the chair and the modern facilities
Day one:  Rinal greeted me and sited me in the chair She explained that she would have to see what is apparent by examination an she asked me about the issues and pain I was having and my compliant about food getting lodged into the right upper teeth .She then asked me to go for an X ray to determine what she would recommend to be done. The X-ray unit is external and I am surprised why Apollo does not have an inhouse unit for this circular XRAY?.
Day Two Rinal called me to say that X rays have been checked and considerable amount of work needs to be done so for root canal had arranged for specialist next day ..This was impressive as I was not aware I had a root canal issue .any how she advised the damage and the price for each route canal treatment since time was short for me I asked her to go ahead and  confirm the time for next appointment
Day three Rinal introduced me to Dr.Siddhu who explained the root canal treatment plan which I consented to the whole process went very smooth well performed y Dr.Siddhu and well co ordinated by Rinal and dental assistant! Of course advise was given on pain and when the anaesthetic wears off !Two root canals were completed in 2 hours ! Great job well done
Day Four Dr,Rinal took all the measurements for the crown preparation and was quite meticulous with the approach and prepared the tooth for getting the crown done after  three days
Day 5 Dental assistant called me how I was feeling and if was in pain but said managed with the Pain killer pescried an soft food!
Day 6.Rinal was ready to test and take further measurements for the crown and cco on the root canal treatment done >all very well done and was assured of the best service for the crown preparation by external lab ad for fitting next day fitting
Day 8. wisdom tooth extraction was well done by Dr.Punit Shah dental l surgeon after having explained the process First class Extraction and Was very relived as tooth was decaying and had a huge hole in it! Job well done !

Day 9 The crowns were ready and fitted and Rinal did further adjustments as my bite ! which had changed as I was eating from right side only following extraction of Left wisdom tooth. She checked it and cleaned a bit a as healing was a bit slow on the tooth! Thanks good advice and guidance again from Rinal 
Day 10 The crown a bit uncomfortable as it was set too high and in the process one of my old  filling was noticed to have broken. Any how Rinal reset the crown feels better after adjustment and also  did the filling of the tooth ..great jo all done said  Adios to both senioritas'
Guys an dolls sorry this is a t long winded and boring but I always fear dental treatment but Rinal did it like a Bolly wood movie with a good ending 
The entire process was so wonderfully executed by Rinal and her specialist team I am suitable impressed wit the quality of the treatment and plan as well as execution and would not hesitate recommending her in future to anyone! 
Happy New Year 2089
reply_text: Thank you so much for your detailed feedback . We strongly believe in creating oral health awareness and informing the patient about all the available options. It was a pleasure to treat you and thank you for your recommendation.

I truly would refer ppl who have complicated cases regards to tooth gum that is the only place to go. Very friendly in nature & full of confidence to take any challenges.You can give a try I bet you will have the same experience as I did

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Implant Rehabilitation,Surgical Tooth Extraction,Zirconia Crowns,Orthotic Splints,
review:
I am deeply grateful to Dr. Rinal Modi and her team of experts in Apollo Dental clinic, at Tardeo, Mumbai. 
I had forgotten to smile and they restored my smile by reconstructing my mouth. I had lost all my molars and premolars and continued with this condition, since 2 decades. I was very scared to go to a dentist, specially after being a diabetic. 
I approached Dr. Rinal through a reference. She is very structured, organised, skilled lovely person. I took the decision of continuing the treatement with her in my first consultancy.
Following was the procedure:
Consultancy
After a preliminary thorough oral inspection, she asked me to get a scan dent X ray. She with her team identified the problem and treatement. Then she explained me the entire process and expenses to restore my lost teeth, very patiently answering all my queries and initiated my courage to go forward.
Treatement
Step 1.
First she got all my rudimentary molar fragments extracted painlessly, and waited for the gums to heal properly before next step.
Step 2.
She did the fillings and cleaning required.after a week
Step 3
Then one by one they got totally 7 implants fixed in my mouth in the order
2 lower right, 2 lower left, 2 upper left and 1 upper right, in about three to four sittings. Giving a break of one week or two weeks as the demand of healing.
After all implants were installed, they checked the position by taking xrays, till they were satisfied thoroughly.
Step 4 
They waited for about 6 months.
Then they did the fixing of abutments followed by crowns. The measurements for crowns were taken accurately till they were perfect. Then they fixed the crowns matching the colour shade with my original teeth colour.
The whole process took a year, since i had gone to USA for family visit for about six months, before step 4.
Result
I got my complete set of teeth for healthy living at the age of 60. I got my confidence and smile back. No one thinks they are false teeth. They look so real. I am very comfortable and dont look my age of 60.
All thanks to Dr. Rinal Modi, she is an Angel and her team of Apollo dentists.
God Bless Her and All.
Had it not been for Rinal, i would not have got my teeth back. I was very skeptic and nervous about the whole issue, but her reassuring and comforting methods propelled and energised me to take this final decision. And look how I am so happy now. All hugs to Dr. RINAL🤗🤗🤗🙂🙃
reply_text: Thank you for sharing your Feedback Ms. Madhavi! Everyone at our practice strives to provide an excellent patient experience. It was a pleasure to treat you and give you your smile back.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My gums used to bleed a lot and I never felt fresh even after brushing twice a day. Hence I got a consult done with Dr Rinal who was recommended by my family and she did my professional cleaning , tooth coloured fillings and whitening - all in just 2 sittings and was so patient . Best part was I was explained how to take care of my teeth and my old habits were corrected. It’s been 2 months since I finished my treatment and I can surely say my dental problems are solved and now I feel so fresh !! Thank you Dr Rinal - amazing doctor !
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback. We are thrilled to hear about your experience and believe in educating our patient with all the dental needs so they can take good care of their oral health.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Artificial Teeth,Immediate Dentures,Dental Cleaning,Impaction / Impacted Tooth Extraction, Tooth Extraction,
review: I visited Dr Rinal for making dentures for my mother and it was so smoothly and well done that we didn’t even realise . We had to get her few extractions done and then wait for the area to heal , then Dr Rinal took the impressions and explained each step to my mother who is actually very scared of dentist but was never scared to visit Dr Rinal. Today she is able to bite into apples and eat her favourite food and we couldn’t be happier to see our mother smile again. We thank her and her team - they are just wonderful and kind .
reply_text: Thank you Mr Sankesh for your honest feedback. We always want the best for our patients and take utmost care to deliver the best possible dental care. It was a pleasure to treat treat your mother and we look forward to seeing her soon.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Rinal is very professional and very friendly at the same time. The clinic was constantly in touch with me before the appointment for confirmations and after the appointment for follow up checks. I also got pdfs on whatsap with detailed guidelines for what to do and what not to.

The procedure was absolutely smooth and the best part about Dr. Rinal is her constant update on what she is doing, what kind of feeling is expected, how much time it will take, explaining what was causing the problem etc during the procedure. This helps is keeping calm and knowing what exactly is going on. I would totally recommend anyone who is experiencing dental issues to visit Dr. Rinal and assure them that they will be thoroughly satisfied. Her clinic is also very well equipped.
reply_text: Thank you Surbhi for your genuine feedback. Our team is always working very hard to deliver the best oral care to our patients and have a hassle free experience. It was our pleasure to treat you.

review:
I recently had the pleasure of visiting Dr. Rinal Sanghavi's dental practice, and I must say it was a truly exceptional experience. From the moment I walked in, the warm and welcoming atmosphere immediately put me at ease.

The quality of service provided by Dr. Rinal Sanghavi was outstanding. The communication was clear, and I appreciated the effort to involve me in decisions about my dental care.

The clinic's cleanliness was impeccable and the well maintained modern technology used during my treatment definitely added to the overall efficiency and effectiveness of the procedures.

In conclusion, I highly recommend Dr. Rinal Sanghavi's services. The combination of expertise, professionalism, and a patient-centric approach creates a dental experience that surpasses expectations. I'm grateful to have found such a reliable and caring dental practice.
